document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the Scathophagidae (Diptera) of the Palaearctic region, with notes on their taxonomy and faunistics

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the Scathophagidae (Diptera) of the Palaearctic region, with notes on their taxonomy and faunistics

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cordylura vittata
Meigen, 1826: 236
. HOLOTYPE : J, type locality not given; 1 st label ‘ Dflc’ , 2 nd label ‘ Bhn. ’, 3 rd red label ‘
vittata MG.
, coll. H.Loew’ , 4 th red label ‘J, Type’ (ZMHB).

Cordylura unicolor
Loew, 1864: 217
,
syn. nov.
HOLOTYPE : ♀ , Spain , Andalusia , Staudinger leg. (depository unknown).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note. All characters of
C. unicolor
are within the limits of variability of
A. vittata
and I therefore consider
C. unicolor
to be a junior synonym of
A. vittata
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cordylura inermis Loew, 1869: 178
. HOLOTYPE : ♀ , USA , New Hampshire (depository unknown). Synonymized by
VOCKEROTH (1965: 840)
.

Parallelomma nudicornis Cresson, 1918: 135
. HOLOTYPE : J, USA , California , Berkeley Hills, Alameda County, 22.iii.1908 , E. T. Cresson jr. leg., No. 6181 (USNM). Synonymized by
VOCKEROTH (1965: 840)
.

Parallelomma paridis Hering, 1923:200
. HOLOTYPE : J(?), Germany , ‘Jungfernheide [= part of Berlin ]’ (ZMHB). Synonymized by
ŠIFNER (1978: 290)
.

Chylizosoma paucheti Séguy, 1932: 153
. HOLOTYPE : ♀ , France , ‘forêt de Herz [= forest at Herz], iv.’; labelled: ‘ Chylizosoma paucheti, E. Séguy det.’, red label ‘Type’ (MNHN). Synonymized by
ŠIFNER (1978: 291)
.

Chylizosoma beckeri Séguy, 1932: 153
. HOLOTYPE : J, Estonia , ‘Dorpat [= Tartu ], 30.iii.’; labelled: ‘
Cordylura vittata Meig.
, det. Becker’, red label ‘Type’ (MNHN). Synonymized by
ŠIFNER (1978: 290)
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note. The proposed synonymy of
C. beckeri
with
Americina media ( ŠIFNER 2003a: 64 )
was an error.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Chylizosoma hostae Hering, 1955: 6
. HOLOTYPE : ♀ , Japan , Mie provincie, Ôsudigami, 4.vii.1952 , Sasakawa leg., Hering det. (ZMHB). Synonymized by
ŠIFNER (1978: 290)
.

Chylizosoma sasakawae Hering, 1955: 7
. HOLOTYPE : ♀ , Japan , Nara province , Omine Mt., 25.vi.1953 , Sasakawa leg., M. Hering det. (ZMHB). Synonymized by
ŠIFNER (1978: 292)
.

Chylizosoma albamentum Séguy, 1962: 163
. HOLOTYPE : ♀ , China , ‘ Kan-su [= Gansu ], 8.v.1919 , E. Licent leg., Séguy det.’ (MNHN). Synonymized by
ŠIFNER (1978: 290)
.

Cordylura convallaria Kaltenbach, 1874: 724
. HOLOTYPE : J, Austria ; 1 label with the name
convallaria
and the name of locality ‘Charl. br. [=?], No. 11372’ (NHMW, see Note). Synonymized by
ŠIFNER (1978: 291)
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Note. I discovered the male deposited in NHMW in 1972. The species name is apparently handwritten by Kaltenbach and it is most probably the holotype .

New record. AUSTRIA :
without locality, 1 ♀ , labelled ‘ Cord. convallariae Kaltenbach,

Mik det.’ and with one leaf of
Polygonatum sp.
with a mine (NHMW).
